results.description: Jono Lance kicks 14 points to give Worcester a hard-fought 19-14 win over Harlequins at the Stoop.
results.title: Premiership: Jono Lance's 14 points help Worcester Warriors to victory over Harlequins

results.description: Bath face Northampton, Gloucester take on Saracens and Worcester travel to Harlequins in the Premiership & Bedford v Newcastle in the Championship.
results.title: Saracens, Bath, Northampton Saints & Gloucester in action

results.description: Harry Williams scores the winning try to maintain Exeter's 100% Premiership record on trips to Worcester.
results.shortTitle: Exeter snatch another win at Worcester
results.title: Premiership: Exeter Chiefs score late to snatch 24-20 win over Worcester at Sixways

results.description: Northampton rally to score five second-half tries and beat Worcester in tough conditions at Franklin's Gardens.
results.title: Premiership: Northampton Saints 35-16 Worcester Warriors

results.description: Saturday's Premiership commentaries - follow coverage on BBC Radio 5 Live Sports Extra and local radio.
results.title: Listen: Saturday's Premiership commentaries

results.description: Ted Hill and Perry Humphreys score the tries as Worcester beat under-strength Leicester on the opening day of the Premiership season.
results.shortTitle: Warriors beat Tigers in campaign opener
results.title: Premiership: Worcester narrowly see off Leicester 24-16 in tight campaign opener

thumbnail.altText: Worcester's Melani Nanai and Leicester's E W Viljoen compete for the same high ball

results.description: Despite having big names away at the World Cup, Saracens and Exeter lead the contenders as the Premiership season starts.
results.title: Premiership: Saracens & Exeter Chiefs lead contenders for 2019-20 crown

thumbnail.altText: Alex Goode with the Premiership Rugby trophy

results.description: Relive Saracens' opening-weekend loss to Northampton Saints as it happened, while Exeter, Saracens and Worcester all win.
results.shortTitle: Relive Saracens' opening-weekend loss to Saints
results.title: Premiership: Relive Saracens' opening-weekend loss to Saints as it happened

results.description: Pool winners Sale, Harlequins and Exeter are joined by best-placed runners-up Saracens in the Premiership Cup semi-finals.
results.shortTitle: Sale, Quins, Exeter & Sarries reach semis
results.title: Premiership Rugby Cup: Sale, Harlequins, Exeter & Saracens reach semi-finals

results.description: Exeter Chiefs come back from a half-time deficit to comfortably beat Worcester Warriors in the Premiership Rugby Cup at Sixways.
results.title: Premiership Rugby Cup: Worcester Warriors 19-34 Exeter Chiefs

results.description: Manu Vunipola - the younger cousin of England's Mako and Billy - scores his first Saracens try as the Premiership Cup begins.

results.title: Premiership Cup: Manu Vunipola scores first try as top flight rugby union season begins

results.description: David Denton, capped 42 times by Scotland, retires aged 29 following a concussion he sustained playing for Leicester in October.
results.title: Scotland forward David Denton retires following concussion

about.label: Concussion and head trauma in sport

thumbnail.altText: David Denton in action for Scotland

results.description: Ben Te'o's England career is over after he signed a short-term deal with French Top 14 side Toulon.
results.shortTitle: Te'o's England career over with move
results.title: Ben Te'o: England career over as centre joins Toulon

results.description: Worcester Warriors allow head coach Rory Duncan - a target for South African side Southern Kings - to leave Sixways.
results.shortTitle: Worcester allow coach Duncan to leave
results.title: Rory Duncan: Worcester Warriors allow head coach to talk to other clubs

thumbnail.altText: Rory was director of rugby at South African side Cheetahs before joining Warriors in 2018

results.description: The 2019-20 Premiership season will start with Bristol hosting West Country rivals Bath on Friday, 18 October.
results.shortTitle: Bristol host Bath in Premiership opener
results.title: Premiership fixtures 2019-20: Bristol host Bath in season opener
